ORG_0000004 - nonprofit organization

Label

nonprofit organization

Alternate name

not for profit

Definition

A legal entity of associated persons created for a specific purpose, typically a mission, in which excess revenue is reinvested to serve the entityâ€™s mission

Definition source

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447

Example

Doctors Without Borders, Duke University, The American Medical Association

Term editor

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447
